title: Sex in the Office
description: Lexi's boss is locked away in his office having a meeting with two of the hottest young entrepreneurs in the city. For her, it's an opportunity for hot, no holds barred, office fun. When she crashes their meeting, they give it to her exactly the way she likes it.Lexi has to show two new interns around the office, but she shows them a lot more.The contractors remodelling her boss's office are making a lot of noise, but Lexi knows just how to get them to be quiet.During a presentation in the board room, Candace and her colleagues get up to some really naughty things.
author: S. Greyson
